audioText: Cette technologie révolutionnaire existait naguère uniquement dans l'imagination des auteurs de science-fiction, mais elle façonne désormais notre réalité quotidienne de manière spectaculaire.
question: Where did this revolutionary technology exist previously?
options: Only in the imagination of science fiction writers
explanation: The text states 'Cette technologie révolutionnaire existait naguère uniquement dans l'imagination des auteurs de science-fiction' - This revolutionary technology formerly existed only in the imagination of science fiction writers. 'Naguère' means formerly/not long ago, indicating something that existed in the recent past but no longer does in the same way.
source: Technology evolution and science fiction becoming reality
